info.name: PetStore API Tests - QA Assignment
info.description:
# PetStore API Test Collection

**Author:** QA Automation Engineer Candidate
**Date:** January 2026
**API Base URL:** https://petstore.swagger.io/v2

## Test Coverage

### Endpoints Tested:
1. **POST /pet** - Create a new pet (10 test cases)
2. **GET /pet/{petId}** - Get pet by ID (10 test cases)
3. **PUT /pet** - Update existing pet (5 test cases)
4. **DELETE /pet/{petId}** - Delete pet (5 test cases)
5. **GET /pet/findByStatus** - Find pets by status (5 test cases)

**Total: 35 Test Cases**

## Test Types:
- ‚úÖ Positive tests (happy path)
- ‚ùå Negative tests (error handling)
- üîÑ Boundary tests (edge cases)
- ‚ö° Performance tests (response time)
- üîê Security tests (input validation)

## How to Run:
1. Import collection into Postman
2. Run collection using Collection Runner
3. View test results in Postman console

item.name: POST /pet - Create Pet
TC01 - Create pet with all valid fields

exec: // Test: Response has correct content type
// Test: Response body contains pet ID
// Save pet ID for subsequent tests
// Test: Response body contains correct pet name
pm.test('Response contains correct pet name', function () {

request.description: Create a new pet with all valid fields including category, tags, photoUrls, and status.
